phrs.translation: 软骨, 脆骨, 软骨结构, 肉中难吃的硬组织
跳动软骨, 跳动的软骨, 抽动的软骨

sentences.sentence: Chicken crisp Bone, Gristle with Sweet chili sauce, Mouthful of crisp!
sentences.translation: 酥脆鸡脆骨、乌巢秘制甜辣酱，满口香脆！

sentences.sentence: Remaining vultures grab slabs of softened gristle and greedily devour them.
sentences.translation: 秃鹫们夺取了软骨的厚片，贪婪地吞噬了它们。

sentences.sentence: It is defeat that bone to flint; it is defeat that turns gristle to muscle; it is defeat that makes men invincible.
sentences.translation: 是挫折使骨头坚如燧石；是挫折使软骨变成肌肉；是挫折使人战无不胜。
